item.title: By: Cath from Cath's Cookery Creations!
item.dc:creator: Cath from Cath's Cookery Creations!
item.description: Great minds think alike! I made Eve this week as well but as my belated birthday cake to take to work (my post will be up next week). Your version looks great and I am very jealous you have done a course at Savour as it is on my wish list. I didn't end up attempting the mushrooms and chocolate leaves as I ran out of time but the whole thing was very tasty. Have a great weekend :)
item.content:encoded: Great minds think alike! I made Eve this week as well but as my belated birthday cake to take to work (my post will be up next week). Your version looks great and I am very jealous you have done a course at Savour as it is on my wish list. I didn’t end up attempting the mushrooms and chocolate leaves as I ran out of time but the whole thing was very tasty. Have a great weekend ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Maggie
item.dc:creator: Maggie
item.description:
Congratulations on your little cupcake! Looks good enough to eat! :)
Love your blog and recipes, thanks for the Eve cake, I enjoy a challenge. Hugs Maggie
